paragraphs.title: Configuration
paragraphs.text:
val NumPartitions = 32
val OptSaveMode: Option[org.apache.spark.sql.SaveMode] = Some(org.apache.spark.sql.SaveMode.Overwrite/*ErrorIfExists*/)
val OptExportSaveMode: Option[org.apache.spark.sql.SaveMode] = Some(org.apache.spark.sql.SaveMode.Overwrite)
val DatasetId = 1
val StudyName = "anticipation"
val CsvDelimiter = "\t"
val ListSeparator = ","

val WorkDir = s"/tmp/$StudyName"
val DisambigDir = s"$WorkDir/disambiguation"
val IndicatorsDir = s"$WorkDir/indicators"
val CsvDir = s"$WorkDir/csv"
val GraphDir = s"$WorkDir/graphml"

result.msg:
NumPartitions: Int = 32
OptSaveMode: Option[org.apache.spark.sql.SaveMode] = Some(Overwrite)
OptExportSaveMode: Option[org.apache.spark.sql.SaveMode] = Some(Overwrite)
DatasetId: Int = 1
StudyName: String = anticipation
CsvDelimiter: String = "	"
ListSeparator: String = ,
WorkDir: String = /tmp/anticipation
DisambigDir: String = /tmp/anticipation/disambiguation
IndicatorsDir: String = /tmp/anticipation/indicators
CsvDir: String = /tmp/anticipation/csv
GraphDir: String = /tmp/anticipation/graphml

paragraphs.text:
val flattenList = udf { (l: Seq[Any]) => Option(l).map(_.mkString(ListSeparator)) }

def csvWriter(df: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame) = df.repartition(1).write.format("com.databricks.spark.csv").option("header", "true").option("delimiter", CsvDelimiter)

paragraphs.title: Author indicators
paragraphs.text:
%md

#### latest_pub_year
latest publication year for all the publications authored by the author

#### impact
sum of the impact of the publications authored by the author

#### pub_count
number of publications authored by the author

#### conf_count
number of publications authored by the author which are considered as conferences

result.msg:
latest_pub_year

latest publication year for all the publications authored by the author

impact

sum of the impact of the publications authored by the author

pub_count

number of publications authored by the author

conf_count

number of publications authored by the author which are considered as conferences

paragraphs.text: val publicationIndicators = sqlc.read.parquet(s"$IndicatorsDir/publication_instances_and_indicators-did_$DatasetId.parquet")

result.msg: publicationIndicators: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [pub_id: bigint, is_main: boolean, is_backward: boolean, is_forward: boolean, year: smallint, times_cited: int, document_types: array<string>, abstract: string, is_conference: boolean, author_keywords: array<string>, keywords_plus: array<string>, research_areas: array<string>, wos_categories: array<string>, scielo_categories: array<string>, scielo_collections: array<string>, pub_dis_id: bigint, dis_title: string, pub_lifetime: smallint, pub_impact: float]

paragraphs.title: Authors
paragraphs.text: val authors = sqlc.read.parquet(s"$DisambigDir/disambiguated_authors-did_$DatasetId.parquet").withColumnRenamed("id", "author_id").withColumnRenamed("dis_id", "author_dis_id").withColumnRenamed("dis_name", "author_dis_name").withColumnRenamed("pub_id", "author_pub_id").persist(org.apache.spark.storage.StorageLevel.MEMORY_ONLY_SER)

result.msg: authors: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [did: int, author_pub_id: bigint, author_id: bigint, raw: string, is_anonymous: boolean, last_name: string, maiden_name: string, given_names: array<array<string>>, suffix: string, nickname: string, affiliations: array<smallint>, is_valid: boolean, generated_full_name: string, group_key: string, author_dis_id: bigint, author_dis_last_name: string, author_dis_given_names: array<array<string>>, author_dis_name: string]

paragraphs.title: Flat authors CSV
paragraphs.text:
val flatAuthors = authors.withColumn("affiliations", flattenList('affiliations)).drop("raw")
flatAuthors.show(5)
OptSaveMode.foreach(csvWriter(flatAuthors).mode(_).save(s"$CsvDir/author_instances-did_$DatasetId.csv"))

- no author lost during processing
*/

paragraphs.title: FIXME lost authors in publications because of author disambiguation
paragraphs.text:
%sql
select pub_id, authors, size(s) as dis_author_count
from (select pub_id, collect_set(author_dis_id) as s, collect_list(author_dis_id) as l, collect_list(generated_full_name) as authors from authors_to_publications group by pub_id) t
where (size(l) - size(s)) > 0
%sql select author_latest_pub_year, count(*) c from author_indicators group by author_latest_pub_year order by author_latest_pub_year
%sql select author_pub_count, count(*) c from author_indicators group by author_pub_count order by author_pub_count desc
%sql select author_conf_count, count(*) c from author_indicators group by author_conf_count order by author_conf_count desc

%md

### Collaboration indicators

#### co_pub_count
number of common publications between two authors

result.msg:
Collaboration indicators

co_pub_count

number of common publications between two authors

paragraphs.text:
val authorCollaborations = sqlc.sql("SELECT pub_dis_id, collect_set(author_dis_id) AS author_dis_ids, year FROM authors_to_publications WHERE is_main=true GROUP BY pub_dis_id, year").flatMap { r =>
    val pid = r.getLong(0)
    val year = r.getShort(2)
    r.getSeq[Long](1).combinations(2).toSeq.map { e =>
        val pairs = e.sorted
        (pairs(0), pairs(1), pid, year)
    }
}.toDF(
    "author_dis_id_1", "author_dis_id_2", "pub_dis_id", "year"
).coalesce(NumPartitions).persist(org.apache.spark.storage.StorageLevel.MEMORY_ONLY_SER)

authorCollaborations.show(5)

paragraphs.title: Collaborations CSV
paragraphs.text: OptSaveMode.foreach(csvWriter(authorCollaborations).mode(_).save(s"$CsvDir/author_collaborations-did_$DatasetId.csv"))

val authorCollaborationIndicators = authorCollaborations.groupBy(
    'author_dis_id_1, 'author_dis_id_2
).agg(
    count('pub_dis_id) as "co_pub_count",
    min('year) as "start_year"
).coalesce(NumPartitions).persist(org.apache.spark.storage.StorageLevel.MEMORY_ONLY_SER)
authorCollaborationIndicators.registerTempTable("author_collaboration_indicators")

authorCollaborationIndicators.describe("co_pub_count", "start_year").show()
authorCollaborationIndicators.show(5)

paragraphs.title: Collaboration indicators CSV
paragraphs.text: OptSaveMode.foreach(csvWriter(authorCollaborationIndicators).mode(_).save(s"$CsvDir/author_collaboration_indicators-did_$DatasetId.csv"))
%sql select co_pub_count, count(*) c from author_collaboration_indicators group by co_pub_count order by c desc

paragraphs.title: Author collaboration graph
paragraphs.text:
val authorCollaborationGraph = {
    import org.apache.tinkerpop.gremlin.structure.T
    val g = org.apache.tinkerpop.gremlin.tinkergraph.structure.TinkerGraph.open()
    val verticesMap = authorIndicators/*.filter('author_depths.contains(1))*/.select(
        'author_dis_id, 'author_dis_name, 'author_first_pub_year, 'author_latest_pub_year, 'author_impact, 'author_pub_count, 'author_conf_count
    ).collect().map { r =>
        val id: java.lang.Long = r.getLong(0)
        val v = g.addVertex(
            T.id, id,
            T.label, r.getString(1),
            "first_pub_year", new java.lang.Short(r.getShort(2)),
            "latest_pub_year", new java.lang.Short(r.getShort(3)),
            "impact", new java.lang.Double(r.getDouble(4)),
            "pub_count", new java.lang.Long(r.getLong(5)),
            "conf_count", new java.lang.Long(r.getLong(6)))
        id -> v
    }.toMap
    authorCollaborationIndicators.collect().foreach { r =>
        verticesMap(r.getLong(0)).addEdge(
            "collaborates_with",
            verticesMap(r.getLong(1)),
            "co_pub_count", new java.lang.Long(r.getLong(2)),
            "start_year", new java.lang.Short(r.getShort(3)))
    }
    g
}
val authorCollaborationGraphPath = s"$GraphDir/author-collaborations.graphml"
authorCollaborationGraph.io(org.apache.tinkerpop.gremlin.structure.io.IoCore.graphml()).writeGraph(authorCollaborationGraphPath)
